eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Hall, NE; AT 11:11 AM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:26 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: WATCH FOR WHITE MALE BEIGE SHIRT DARK GREEN SHORTS CAMO BACKPACK IF LOCATED DO NOT APPROACH KEEP WATCH CALL 911
